### lowerBuiltin() {#a629ecd8b62d92369a14fe3d5894380be}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; bool &gt; llvm::SPIRV::lowerBuiltin (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> DemangledCall, InstructionSet::InstructionSet Set, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp; MIRBuilder, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> OrigRet, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42; OrigRetTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &gt; &amp; Args, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirvglobalregistry">SPIRVGlobalRegistry</a> &#42; GR)</>}>
Lowers a builtin function call using the provided <code>DemangledCall</code> skeleton and external instruction <code>Set</code>.

<SectionUser title="Returns">
the lowering success status if the called function is a recognized builtin, std::nullopt otherwise.
</SectionUser>

<code>DemangledCall</code> is the skeleton of the lowered builtin function call. <code>Set</code> is the external instruction set containing the given builtin. <code>OrigRet</code> is the single original virtual return register if defined, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register(0)</a> otherwise. <code>OrigRetTy</code> is the type of the <code>OrigRet</code>. <code>Args</code> are the arguments of the lowered builtin call.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/spirv/spirvbuiltins-h/#l00037">37</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/spirv/spirvbuiltins-h">SPIRVBuiltins.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### lowerBuiltinType() {#aae5583a69517f4316fa4716e051265a7}

Generates the corresponding machine instructions for the target type or gets the already existing OpType&lt;...&gt; register from the global registry <code>GR</code>.

</SectionUser>

### parseBuiltinCallArgumentBaseType() {#a6a6dbec2a4e426cbd27aeca7cc4217c3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Type &#42; llvm::SPIRV::parseBuiltinCallArgumentBaseType (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> DemangledCall, unsigned ArgIdx, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp; Ctx)</>}>
Parses the provided <code>ArgIdx</code> argument base type in the <code>DemangledCall</code> skeleton.

A base type is either a basic type (e.g. i32 for int), pointer element type (e.g. i8 for char&#42;), or builtin type (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetexttype">TargetExtType</a>).


<SectionUser title="Returns">
LLVM <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> or nullptr if unrecognized
</SectionUser>

<code>DemangledCall</code> is the skeleton of the lowered builtin function call. <code>ArgIdx</code> is the index of the argument to parse.
